analysis.description:
TriipInvestorsServices.claim (/unique_chucks/27/0x6051988f38808c695546ccb55f1c6930848a8a23.sol#148-178) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- seller.transfer(payoffAmount) (/unique_chucks/27/0x6051988f38808c695546ccb55f1c6930848a8a23.sol#163)

TriipInvestorsServices.claimByKPI (/unique_chucks/27/0x6051988f38808c695546ccb55f1c6930848a8a23.sol#178-240) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- seller.transfer(payoffAmount) (/unique_chucks/27/0x6051988f38808c695546ccb55f1c6930848a8a23.sol#206-207)
	- seller.transfer(payoffAmount) (/unique_chucks/27/0x6051988f38808c695546ccb55f1c6930848a8a23.sol#225-228)

TriipInvestorsServices.refund (/unique_chucks/27/0x6051988f38808c695546ccb55f1c6930848a8a23.sol#244-248) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- buyer.transfer(refundAmount) (/unique_chucks/27/0x6051988f38808c695546ccb55f1c6930848a8a23.sol)

TriipInvestorsServices.confirmPurchase (/unique_chucks/27/0x6051988f38808c695546ccb55f1c6930848a8a23.sol#98-118) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(startTime == 0)
